articles.author: Imad Isseid, Melanie Lidman
articles.title: Israeli settlers kill 19-year-old Palestinian American, officials and witnesses say - AP News
articles.description: The Palestinian Health Ministry and a witness say that Israeli settlers in the occupied West Bank shot and killed a Palestinian American in an attack on a village. Resident Raed Abu Ali says the attack took place Wednesday in the village of Mukhmas. The Israe…
articles.content: MUKHMAS, West Bank (AP) Israeli settlers in the occupied West Bank shot and killed a Palestinian American man during an attack on a village, the Palestinian Health Ministry and a witness said Thursda… [+6560 chars]
